{{Infobox Berry |name = #13 Wepear |image = [[File:Wepear.png]] |caption = The potent mix of bitter and sour in this Berry seems to promote digestion. The flower is white and beautiful. |growtime = 6m 40s |harvest = 12 berries |replant = 40% |points = 30 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Wepear''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Rawst]] and at least 1 [[Oran]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 mins 30 secs || 5 mins 50 secs || 6 mins 15 secs || 6 mins 40 secs - 13 mins 20 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WepearTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Wepear berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || || || [[File:Oran.png|30px]]
